reviews.review:
Stop looking at the reviews and buy it already !
The negative reviews are mostly about the game's length (2h to any%) but it's actually a dozen hours to 100%. In my opinion, it's the amount of time you should take into consideration when looking at the price/time worth of a game.

a pure classic and forces you to use your mind and timing

This game is something very rare. It's perfect. No flaws. There is nothing wrong with it. It is a solid gaming experience from beginning to end. if you have Steam, this game should be in your library.

This game is hilarious. Pretty much every joke sticks. The portal concept is so well executed and built upon that i finished this game 3 times. 10/10

This game is excellent.  The game is structured very well, with the puzzles serving as both gameplay and story at the same time.  Highly recommend Portal.

One of the all time classics. Don't pass this up.

8/10

Nineteen increasingly difficult puzzle rooms with additional bonus content in the form of advanced versions of six of the rooms, plus challenge maps where you can play for speed or efficiency to win medals.  Takes a lot of thought and considerable skill building to consume all the content provided.  Very replayable.

I have played this game and I have to say that this game is pure genious. It offers you a lot of fun with solving puzzles. The game also have a very good plot, music and ambient and graphics. Valve created a good alternative for Half-Life games. If you want to buy it you should definitive.

At first I was a little disappointed, since I've expected something more than just "escape-room" game, but as I was playing it, it only became more fun and interesting. Especially the last level and the ending which really left a good impression on me.
Portal is an aboslutetly great game!  I had so much fun playing it! But it was pretty short though. But the sequel is longer!
Physics engine is great, oldie but goodie. 8/10

i love all the strategy there is to beating  level. it can get really hard and supposedly i'm only doing training. so that's part of the fun. trying a theory to get to the next task.. than finding out if it sinks or swim. whether at the  sametime your not completely hopeless because they have picture diagram for instructions.
Amazing story for a game. I beat the game itself in like 3 hours, but you can do community created puzzles after the main story to keep challenging yourself.
portal is always forever good. although portal 2 is even better.
I recently found this weird-ish indie game and I think it was a fun concept game, maybe try a little harder next time?
Absoluter Klassiker. Portal und Portal 2 sind Spiele, die wahrscheinlich jedem Spa√ü machen.
It has a short play time BUT it is super fun!
the cake is fake im sure in that -_-
portal is really good game buy it if you like games and it has hard puzzles so expect to be stuck on some part for a while but it feels great to figure out the puzzles yourself
es algo corto pero es muy entretenido
This is one of my favorite games along with its sequal! It has great story and insane puzzles!
The Cake is not a Lie

En effet, il est beau, int√©ressant, complexe, dur√©e de vie de 10h et des d√©fis plut√¥t dr√¥les qui t'obligent √† utiliser des techniques de speedrunners pour faire tous les faire. Le 2 est plus dur, apporte plus de gameplay, plus long, plus beau, mais le 1 pose d'ENORMES bases et ce n'√©tait qu'un petit mod au d√©but. Les portails sont tr√®s bien mis en avant, on avance petit √† petit, le difficult√© est bien g√©r√©e et aucune salle ne ressemble √† une autre. Je recommande l'achat de ce jeu (et du 2 aussi). This was a great proof of concept and an excellent tech demo. But would I recommend you spend a lot of money on this? Fuck no. Buy the sequel.
Amazing game, nothing else needs to be said.
